channel.title: ::char screen
channel.description:
how do make it where i can accept the "accept" button? Because when i click accept it doesnt do anything.. Also how do i make when people log in they have items on them like on rs2 they start with like runes sheild and sword..
24 views and no posts?...wtf?

item.title: ::char screen
item.dc:creator: @killah246 Killah246
item.description:
@killah246 wrote:

add this in case 185:

case 14067: // Char design accept button RemoveAllWindows(); break; this will close the window
